alert.note: Alert for Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 3:52PM EST until November 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the southern half of the county and 1 to 3 inches in the northern half of the county during the advisory period. * WHERE...Menominee County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin as early as tonight across the advisory area. However, snow rates are expected to be at their highest during the advisory time frame, equating to rapid accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
